params.name: bookingId
params.doc: ID of the booking to be canceled.

params.name: options
params.doc: An object representing the available options for canceling a booking.

description: The `cancelBooking()` function returns a Promise that resolves when the specified booking is canceled.
Canceling a booking causes the following changes:
- The participant is removed from the session.
- If the booking creates a session, the session that was created is deleted from the calendar.
- The participant is notified, according to the `participantNotification` properties.
When `cancelBooking()` is invoked, the cancellation is validated against the service's bookings policy.
If `cancelBooking()` is invoked by a Bookings Admin, the service's bookings policy can be ignored by setting `ignoreCancellationPolicy` to `true`.
> Only users with the **Bookings Admin** [role](https://support.wix.com/en/article/roles-permissions-overview#bookings-admin) can cancel other customers' bookings.

examples.title: Cancel a booking.
body: /*  Returns a promise that resolves to:

members.name: formatted
members.doc: A string containing the full address of this location.

members.name: addressLine1
members.doc: Main address line, usually street and number, as free text.

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains Apt, Suite, and Floor.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street name, number, and apartment number.

members.name: location
members.doc: Coordinates of the physical address.

members.name: city
members.doc: City name.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Subdivision. Usually state, region, prefecture or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).

members.name: country
members.doc: Country code in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) code format.

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: Zip/postal code.

members.name: attended
members.doc: Whether the booked contact attended the session.

members.name: numberOfAttendees
members.doc: Number of attendees that attended the session. This can be greater than 1 when the booking is made for a group of people.

members.name: participantNotification
members.doc: Whether to notify the participants about the booking confirmation, and an optional custom message.

members.name: flowControlSettings
members.doc: Sets the cancel booking flow behavior.

members.name: suppressAuth
members.doc: When `true`, prevents permission checks from running for the operation.

members.name: bookingId
members.doc: ID of the canceled booking.

members.name: participantNotification
members.doc: Whether to notify the participants about the booking confirmation, and an optional custom message.

members.name: suppressAuth
members.doc: When `true`, prevents permission checks from running for the operation.

docs.summary: Contact details of the customer making the booking.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact's ID.

members.name: firstName
members.doc: Contact's first name. When populated from a standard booking form, this property corresponds to the **Name** field.

members.name: lastName
members.doc: Contact's last name.

members.name: email
members.doc: Contact's email, used to create a new contact or get existing one from the [CRM API](wix-crm/introduction).

members.name: phone
members.doc: Contact's phone number.

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: Contact's time zone.

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: Contact's country in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

members.name: address
members.doc: Contact's full [address](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/$w/addressinput/value).

members.name: participantNotification
members.doc: Whether to notify the participants about the booking confirmation, and an optional custom message.

members.name: suppressAuth
members.doc: When `true`, prevents permission checks from running for the operation.

members.name: bookingId
members.doc: ID of the declined booking.

docs.summary: Sets the cancel booking flow behavior.

members.name: ignoreCancellationPolicy
members.doc:
Whether to ignore the service's cancellation policy.
<!--ONLY:REST
 Requires BOOKINGS.IGNORE_BOOKING_POLICY permission.
<!--END:ONLY:REST-->       
<!--ONLY:VELO-->
 Requires "Manage Wix Bookings App" and "Manage Bookings' Calendar" [roles](https://support.wix.com/en/article/roles-permissions-overview#bookings-admin).
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->

members.doc: Contact details of the customer making the booking.
